ygData.msgSnippet: Burning Hammer was first, he came up close, and pulled a blaster. Perplex: Too scared to use your fists? Burning hammer: No! Shut up! Burning Hammer puts away

Subject: Re: Windlord makes a question to Perplex.

From: "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@...>

Burning Hammer was first, he came up close, and pulled a blaster.

Perplex: Too scared to use your fists?

Burning hammer: No! Shut up!

Burning Hammer puts away the blaster and swings an uppercut at Perplex.
Perplex ducks, and chops Burning Hammer across the chest. He swings his fist
hard, slamming it into Burning Hammer's face. He spins around and drives an
elbow into Burning Hammer's throat. He stops. Burning Hammer is still
standing, much to his surprise. Burning hammer reaches out with both hands
and grabs Perplex around the throat, choking him to the ground...

----- Original Message -----
From: <Rudra656@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, February 08, 2001 8:32 PM
Subject: Re: Windlord makes a question to Perplex.
